events.message: I recently received my order, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The case was reviewed and categorized under the refund cluster due to customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and to assist the customer further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you would like a refund, and Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request to process it quickly?
The order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the item did not match the description and arrived damaged.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund as soon as you confirm that the item has been returned to us.
I confirm that I will return the product tomorrow and I appreciate your quick response and support.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The money should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with our resolution.
We are closing your case now. If you need any further assistance, please feel free to contact us again.
